mapper.select: select org.name as areaname, p.pertainareaid, sum(nvl(r.projectsize, 0)) as projectsize, sum(nvl(r.investmentamount, 0)) as amount from rcm_formalassessment_info p, rcm_formalassessment_report r, (select * from rcm_noticedecision_info where consenttoinvestment in ('1', '3')) n, sys_org org where p.wf_state in ( '2') and p.businessid = r.businessid(+) and p.businessid = n.projectformalid(+) and p.businessid in (select formal_id from RCM_DECISION_RESOLUTION where VOTE_STATUS = 2 and decision_result in ('1', '3')) and p.pertainareaid = org.orgpkvalue(+) group by org.name, p.pertainareaid
